remarks: The span of a vector belongs to the range of isomorphism H. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2014.)
statement:
dihlsprn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihlsprn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihlsprn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dihlsprn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dihlsprn.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihlsprn $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. ran I ) $.
